data.title: The Lion King
data.meta_description: Kids can experience the magic of Broadway for free with Kids Night on Broadway.
data.text:
Note for Ordering Tickets Online

After clicking the Buy Now link, you should arrive on a page listing the available Kids' Night on Broadway performance. Click "Find Tickets." This should apply the offer code automatically. You should see eligible Kids' Night seat sections indicated with the promotional price in red. If you are not seeing the promotional pricing, click "Enter Promo Code" and input the Kids' Night offer code provided on this page.

Please make sure when selecting seats that you are selecting from Kids' Night eligible seats. Not all seats will be available for Kids' Night pricing, and purchases made at full price are not refundable or exchangeable. The discount must be applied before you select your seats; it will not automatically appear at the end of the transaction.

With the purchase of two or more tickets for the same performance, each ticket will be issued at a face value of 50% off, plus a facility fee per ticket. A minimum purchase of two tickets is required. All guests must have a ticket to attend shows. No additional 'free' tickets are added to orders or available at the theatre.

Offer not valid on prior purchased tickets and may not be combined with any other promotions. ALL SALES FINAL. No refunds or exchanges. Other restrictions may apply. Dates, times, prices and cast subject to change without notice.

For any questions about eligible seats or performances, please contact the ticketing service directly at the number below.
